ingredients: 2 tablespoons fresh juice from about 1 lemon, divided
2 large tomatoes, stems and seeds removed, chopped

Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Four lamb loin chops, 4 to 6 ounces each
